data.name: Farming Simulator 2013: Marshall Trailers
data.detailed_description:
Extend your gaming experience with the new official extension for Farming Simulator!
This DLC contains new equipment of the Marshall brand!
Once downloaded, the additional contents will be available in the shop of the game. Be sure to have sufficient funds to buy the machinery.

Contains the following equipment:
  • Marshall BC 32 (Flat / Bale Trailer)
  • Marshall MS 105 (Manure spreader)
  • Marshall QM 16 (Tippers)
  • Marshall ST 1800 (Slurry Tank)
  • Marshall VES 2500 (Manure spreader)

This DLC is compatible with Windows and Mac OS X versions of Farming Simulator 2013® and Farming Simulator 2013® Titanium Edition.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS XP SP3/WINDOWS VISTA SP2/WINDOWS 7
  • Processor: AMD/INTEL 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB OF VIDEO MEMORY ATI RADEON X1600/NVIDIA GEFORCE 7600/INTEL HD 2000 OR HIGHER
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE GAME ACTIVATION AND THE ONLINE GAME

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6.1/10.7.1/10.8.1
  • Processor: AMD/INTEL 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB OF VIDEO MEMORY ATI RADEON X1600/NVIDIA GEFORCE 7600/INTEL HD 2000 OR HIGHER
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE GAME ACTIVATION AND THE ONLINE GAME
